text: Pensmore Mansion, Pensmore Castle or Chateau Pensmore is a chateauesque style mansion in the Ozark Mountains near Highlandville, Missouri. The 72,000sqft\7180sqm mock castle holds 13 bedrooms, 14 baths and is said to be able to withstand earthquakes, tornadoes and even the blast from a nuclear bomb from just a few kilometers away! A conspiracy theory says that Pensmore Mansion will be used as a new White House in the New World Order. There's also said to be kilometers of tunnels under the mansion. Need more information. Category:Buildings and structures in Missouri
title: Pensmore Mansion
